sys_script_include.description: Validates if the date is in the past
sys_script_include.name: Date Validation

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_9e3ba1d2077511106b98fe4f7c1ed03f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_857506_business.Date Validation</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Validates if the date is in the past</description><name>Date Validation</name><script><![CDATA[var DateValidation = Class.create();

 

DateValidation.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

validateDate: function() {

 

  var ActualEndDate = this.getParameter('sysparm_end_date');

 

  return gs.dateDiff(gs.now(),ActualEndDate, true)/86400;

 

  },

 

      type: 'DateValidation'

 

});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-09 23:20:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>9e3ba1d2077511106b98fe4f7c1ed03f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Date Validation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Business Trip App" source="x_857506_business">9d88369f07e111106b98fe4f7c1ed05f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Business Trip App">9d88369f07e111106b98fe4f7c1ed05f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9e3ba1d2077511106b98fe4f7c1ed03f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-09 23:20:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
